forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High around 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
